item.title: Advanced - Graph Reproduction and Analysis of GDP Components
item.description: Team members: Noor Alameri, Brigita Angkasa, Lujia Huang, Martino Armanini, Marco Laube, Deniz Özdemir Source: Homework 3 for Applied Statistics with R by Kostis @ London Business School Key Words: skim, glimpse, ggplot, summarise, mutate, pivot_longer GDP components over time and among countries At the risk of oversimplifying things, the main components of gross domestic product, GDP are personal consumption (C), business investment (I), government spending (G) and net exports (exports - imports).

item.title: Intermediate - General Social Survey of American Media & Email Usage
item.description: Team members: Noor Alameri, Brigita Angkasa, Lujia Huang, Martino Armanini, Marco Laube, Deniz Özdemir Source: Homework 2 for Applied Statistics with R by Kostis @ London Business School Key Words: skim, glimpse, ggplot, summarise, mutate, geom_errorbar, confidence intervals General Social Survey (GSS) The General Social Survey (GSS) gathers data on American society in order to monitor and explain trends in attitudes, behaviours, and attributes. Many trends have been tracked for decades, so one can see the evolution of attitudes, etc in American Society.

item.title: Beginner - Alcohol Consumption in Different Countries
item.description: Team members: Noor Alameri, Brigita Angkasa, Lujia Huang, Martino Armanini, Marco Laube, Deniz Özdemir Source: Homework 1 for Applied Statistics with R by Kostis @ London Business School Key Words: skim, glimpse, ggplot Where Do People Drink The Most Beer, Wine And Spirits? Back in 2014, fivethiryeight.com published an article on alcohol consumption in different countries. The data drinks is available as part of the fivethirtyeight package. Let’s load the data and have a look!
